column3: na ɔman no hyɛɛ ase nye Moab mbabaa no yɛɛ ehuhudze:"

column2: "na wohyiahyiaa ɔman no kɔr hɔn enyame okum afɔr ho; na ɔman no dzidzii
column3: na wɔbɔɔ hɔn mu adze maa hɔn enyame no."

column2: "Na Israel dze noho bɔɔ Baal-peor ho: na EWURADZE ebufuw dzɛɛw Israel do."

column3: Fa ɔman no mu etsitsir nyinara
column4: na sensɛn hɔn ma EWURADZE wɔ ewia do
column5: ma EWURADZE ebufuhyew no ndan mfi Israel do."

column2: "Na Moses see Israel atsɛmbuafo no dɛ
column3: Hom mu obiara nkuku ne mbanyin a wɔdze hɔnho akɔbɔ Baal-peor ho no."

column4: Israelmba no mu kor dze Midiannyi ɔbaa bi baa no nuanom no nkyɛn wɔ Moses n'enyim
column5: nye Israelmba mboanofo no nyinara enyim
column6: aber a worususu wɔ ehyiadzibuw no n'abowano."

column2: "Na aber a ɔsɔfo Aaron ne babanyin Eleazar
column6: na ɔfaa nkambaa kitsaa ne nsamu;"

column2: "na odzii Israelnyi no ekyir kɔr pia no mu
column3: na ɔdze wowɔɔ hɔn beenu nyina hwira hwiraa hɔn mu
column5: nye ɔbaa no ohwiraa no fur mu. Nna ɔyardɔm no siankae fii Israelmba no do."

column2: "Na hɔn a wowuwui wɔ ɔyardɔm no mu no wɔyɛ mpemeduonu anan."

column7: wɔ dɛ ɔatwe me nyinkuntwe no nyinkun wɔ hɔn mu
column8: ma mannhyew Israelmba no wɔ me nyinkuntwe mu."

column3: nye n'asefo a wobedzi n'ekyir no daa asɔfodzi ahyɛmu; osiandɛ ɔatwe ne Nyankopɔn ho nyinkun

column2: "Na Israelnyi no a wokum no no
column3: nyia wokum no kaa Midiannyi ɔbaa no ho no
column6: ɔyɛ Simeonfo egyanom ofi mu ɔbapɔmba."

column2: "Na Midiannyi ɔbaa no a wokum no no
column4: Zur a ɔyɛ otsitsir wɔ Midian egyanom ofi bi mu nkorɔfo do no

column2: "osiandɛ hɔn so wɔdze hɔn ndaadaa a wɔdze tseetsee hom wɔ Peor ho asɛm no mu
column4: Midian ɔsafohen no ne babaa no a wokum no wɔ ɔyardɔm da no mu wɔ Peor ho asɛm no mu no
